thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-German vehicle authority KBA sees no evidence of defeat device in BMW 320d

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-German vehicle authority KBA sees no evidence of defeat device in BMW 320d
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - German Motor Vehicle Authority KBA says :
* BMW 320 DIESEL MODEL COMPLIANT WITH EMISSIONS RULES * KBA SAYS EMISSIONS FOUND TO BE NORMAL UNDER BOTH TEST BENCH AND REAL WORLD TESTING CONDITIONS, NO EVIDENCE OF DEFEAT DEVICES FOUND
* KBA SAYS ENVIRONMENTAL GROUP DEUTSCHE UMWELTHILFE‘S CLAIMS ABOUT INCREASEd NOX LEVELS BASED ON “ABNORMAL OPERATING CONDITIONS” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
